typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PlaceUUID as long,
		ProvinceLegacyID as integer,
		PlaceLegacyID as integer,
		PlaceNameEnglish as string,
		PlaceNameFrench as string,
		RegionUUID as integer,
		PlaceAlternateIndicator as string,
		LastModifiedDate as date,
		PlaceMailingIndicator as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> INTPlace
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
